RelatedSentence: Tzaneen - A Limpopo woman accused of killing her 20 - month - old baby girl appeared in the Ritavi Magistrate 's Court on Monday , police said .
Tzaneen - A Limpopo woman accused of killing her 20 - month - old baby girl appeared in the Ritavi Magistrate 's Court on Monday , police said .
Christina Makhanani Baloyi , 20 , would remain in police custody until her second appearance on Friday , Brigadier Hangwani Mulaudzi said .
Police found the baby 's body inside a pit toilet in Mbekwana village , Letsitele , just outside Tzaneen on Thursday .
Police were alerted by community members after hearing hysterical screams of a baby from the toilet .
Police were alerted by community members after hearing hysterical screams of a baby from the toilet .
Unfortunately , by the time the police arrived and rescued the girl from the stinking , cold toilet pit , Xitsunduxo Baloyi was already dead , he said .

Baloyi , an unemployed mother of two , allegedly strangled the baby and threw her into the toilet , thinking she was dead .
